subject: Track and Field
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: David Rudisha of Kenya set a world record in the 800 meters for the second time in a week, shaving eight-hundredths of a second off the mark he set last weekend in Berlin.
snippet: David Rudisha of Kenya set a world record in the 800 meters for the second time in a week, shaving eight-hundredths of a second off the mark he set last weekend in Berlin.
